review: Very convenient with lots of choices.  Two issues...some things play with sound others you have  to change settings.  Also have to physically turn TV back to hdmi when you are done if you have Comcast remote
author: Ninamat "Calliope"

review: I just purchased a second Fire TV Stick for use with my bedroom TV.  I think that says it all.  Inexpensive, easy to install and use.  Unit does not need to be in direct line of sight with the remote control, so can be inconspicuous.  Very nice and an excellent value.
author: Michael F. Sullivan

review: I love it. Very easy to set up. Works extremely well.
author: JASON LEONARD

review: I thought there would be more selections for free for Prime members.
author: John Mikula

review: Amazing solution. Great alternative to paying crazy cable bills. I've tried the rest and the fire stick is the best.
author: JORGE ORDUZ

review: worked very well and was a snap to install.  very pleased with the speed and downloading of movies and my music thru prime
author: Daniel Funk

review: Very convenient and easy to travel with
author: Kelly Bullard
